extension.description: A multitap increases the number of controller ports, similar to a USB hub. The Super Multitap was released by Hudson Soft in 1993 for use with the Bomberman games.
Un multitap aumenta el numero de mandos, como un hub USB. El Super Multitap se lanzo en 1993 por Hudson Soft para usarlo con los juegos de Bomberman.
Multitap 增加了控制器端口的数量，类似于USB集线器。1993年，Hudson Soft 发布了 Super Multitap，用于炸弹人游戏。
